description.h2: The default value of the xml:lang attribute on non-numeric facts and on link:footnote is 'en-US'.
description.p: XBRL 2.1 does not specify a default value for the xml:lang attribute, but an Interactive Data instance assumes one.

REMARK: This rule establishes what the default value of xml:lang is and therefore can only be indirectly violated by the violation of some other rule. Therefore the only error code that appears here is du-60512-Duplicate-Facts which normally would appear in 6.5.12.

variation.name: 6.5.13 Two non-numeric facts, language specified in one as en-US but not the other, so it defaults to en-US. NOGOOD
variation.description: An instance with two facts with the same effective xml:lang value. NOGOOD.
